name: Elevation
overview: This is "Elevation" for the Commodore Amiga released as Public Domain/Freeware and developed by Lee C. Wilson. Fast arcade platform action in this game where your objective is to guide safely your character from the bottom right of the screen to the upper left avoiding the killing elevators! Once the character starts moving he cannot stop and he can only change direction. This makes the control tricky and challenging. The game has also a beautiful and crazy in game tune.
